executable.title: Surface Comparision
executable.description: This program compares input surface with reference surface. All of the vertex locations are compared from input surface with reference surface and also the scalar array names and scalar values of points or cells.
executable.contributor: Wen Li and Vincent A. Magnotta
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this work was provided by NIH/NINDS award NS050568

file.name: refSurfaceFile
file.description: The reference surface to compare with
file.label: reference surface file

boolean.name: scalarArray
boolean.description: Compare all of the scalar arrays
boolean.label: Scalar Array

boolean.name: cellData
boolean.description: Compare all of the cell data
boolean.label: Cell Data

double.name: tolerance
double.description: The tolerance within which the surfaces must be similar
double.label: Tolerance
